name: Sports & Orthopaedics
description: Our orthopaedic specialists and occupational therapists provide all-rounded treatment of knee, spine, hip and other sports and orthopaedic injuries.

name: Heart
description: Mount Elizabeth hosts the largest concentration of heart specialists in the Asia Pacific region. Equipped with modern technology and world-class facilities, we offer patients renewed possibilities in managing heart health.

name: Cancer
description: Our broad range of diagnostic tests, advanced chemotherapy and radiation treatment, counselling services and dedicated palliative care and support services provide a holistic care environment for positive outcomes.

name: Maternity
description: With a multidisciplinary team of obstetricians, fertility specialists, nurses, lactation consultants and a wide range of amenities, to give you advice, support, and peace of mind

name: Gastroenterology
description: The Gastroenterology Centre unites gastroenterology, hepatology, colorectal and hepato-pancreato-biliary surgery together with nutrition, to optimise recovery.

name: Haematology
description: Our haematology specialists are committed to providing a comprehensive range of services, treatment and specialty care to blood disorder patients of all ages.

name: Neurology
description: The Neurology Centre has an extensive clinical history in treating strokes, brain traumas, epilepsy, neck and spine conditions, and sleep disorders.

name: Fertility (IVF)
description: Our Fertility Centre is committed to help couples overcome a range of fertility issues and to provide the quality care and support they need on their journey to parenthood.

name: Clinical Pathology Laboratory
description: Our laboratory professionals are committed to being the finest in clinical laboratory, histopathology and genetics testing

name: Health Screening
description: Our diverse range of health screening programmes are tailored to meet the needs of both individuals and employees of corporate organisations.

name: Rehabilitation Services
description: Our rehabilitation services include physiotherapy, occupational therapy, podiatry, prosthetics and orthotics, and home care services for patients of all ages.

name: Nutrition & Dietetics
description: Our dietitians provide evidence-based and customised nutrition care to help patients improve health outcomes and healthy individuals reduce disease risks.
